attributes.background: Queen Elizabeth hospital Birmingham car parking charge is now 1% of staffs wages there is never any car parking spaces .why are we paying for parking  when Wales and Scotland NHS staff have parking for free .

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about parking charges at individual car parks are a matter for operator of the car park, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make parking at work permanently free for all NHS workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699
